title: Zilean Bomb Bug?
body: I was playing an ARAM, but realized something was wrong. His bombs (His Q) was detonating and could graphically see his physical bomb on a creep or champion. Problem was: When it detonated. You could not see it and my other teammate said so as well. You could not see an explosion. You could only see a small bright green square in place of the explosion. It was really weird.

replies.body: Myself and party also couldn't see the bomb animations on Zilean. I also had blue tiny question marks on the ground where the bomb was as it finished exploding.
yeah i had this problem today, and noticed it on imqtpie's stream

Hey Skrob! I know exactly what you're talking about. I've got a bug logged for this, and I'll see if I can get a VFX artist on the case this week. If you're curious, the green square is basically a debug string to call out when any particular particle is missing or not hooked up properly.
Bumping this, couldn't see the bomb's go off.
